item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 22, 2024 at 4:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. HTTP: , FTP:, and Dict:? (181 points | 52 comments)

29. LHC experiments at CERN observe quantum entanglement at the highest energy yet (134 points | 113 comments)
